title: Welcome to Player Behavior Sub board
body:
Confused over a punishment you received?
Have questions about how the Player Behavior systems work?

We’ve got you covered. This Board is all about answering these types of questions. We will provide as much feedback and information as we can.

Remember, the more information you provided, the more helpful we can be. Help us help you!

replies.body: I think people tend to over exaggerate how toxic people are, if anything i find most people i play with to be good sports and decent people. I think it relates to how you interact within a game, if your pretty aggro then i guess thats what you're gonna get in return in alot of circumstances.
I agree! People are throwing statistics here that 'almost' every game is hell with toxic players. I've been in TOO MANY LoL servers and OCE is by far the best one. Lol!

It tends to come down to where they are playing. I've never been in B5 so I can't speak to the accuracy of the claims there, and I only ever played ranked with a duo. There were games where I encountered toxic behaviour between B3 and G5, but it was maybe 6 or 7 tops out of 100.

I think it largely comes down to where and when you are playing. You are more likely to encounter it on weekends and late afternoons than you are during weekdays for example.

I agree that many of the claims are largely exaggerated, but if you end up playing consistently in those times when toxicity is higher, in a tier where flaming is much more common, it is quite possible you would see toxicity fairly often. 9 out of 10 is most likely a pretty big exaggeration, but I'd believe 1 in 3 some days.

Not necessarily.
I feel like for the most part that is very true.
But I just had a game where 2 players told me to kill myself, and that I was a nub, and the loss was 100% my fault. Which wasn't really true.

And me being completely honest, in chat I was very passive.

Oh hi people of OCE!

My name is Deep Terror Nami, and I'm from NA. I'm pretty knowledgeable on the Player Behavior systems and have a lot of Rioter references to share in the case of confusion. I help out over on the NA Player Behavior & Moderation board so you might see me around here too. Let me know if you have questions too :3

I dont know why, but I find OCE much less toxic than EUW. In EUW you have retards spamming swear words in Spanish, French, Portuguese and German. It was hard to find any good people there. But here I find ppl more chill and fun to play with :)

I find it complete oppersite haha.

I was on EUW for a while and recently came to OCE and on once there are just young tweens who are flaming and have very short fuses.

I just wanted to say that OCE is extremely toxic. 90% - 95% matches I had there is at least 1 toxic player in there. I use to play in NA and I thought they have the worst community but after I change to OCE, I can't even play a game without muting everyone at the beginning of every match. You guys need to do something about. It's frustrating playing with players with bad sportsmanship.

Hey man,

You can read about all the systems we have here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback

Some of the systems mentioned are

Instant Feedback system
Chat restrictions
Leaver Buster
Intentional feeding detection
That's useful! Thank you.

Then a cam top lane talking shiit all game to the other team saying shes gunna kill them and being toxic and if they don't get their lane they int feed had a group at 1 8 ramus jg then had a ekko bot lane didn't get mid so he feed 1 9 making the game hard to play

I know this has nothing to do with people's behavior or anything to do with anyone, its just 1 champion and a skin which is missing, Veigar's Baron Don Veigar skin, I had it, bought it a few years back and yeh its gone :( refund or put the skin back please ty :)
Hey mate, sending in a player support ticket will be the fastest way to get that resolved. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Created a board discussion but figured I should post something here as well. There needs to be some sort of way to report a player outside of the end game screen. Joined a ranked lobby and immediately a player starts cussing at other players, clearly in violation of the "summoner code". Screenshots of chatbox in the links 1- http://postimg.org/image/8a94y9kxt/ 2- http://postimg.org/image/omj6nzz9d/ 3- http://postimg.org/image/wgjs9e729/ . I'm glad that somebody dodged because I hate playing with players like that
Sending those screenshots to player support is the current reporting method.

Thanks, sent the support ticket. I normally ignore and wait but when it happens in champ select, it usually leads to the player in question or other players going on tilt which results in a one sided loss. I always end up just stopping and leaving league because I don't want to end up in a lobby with the same player again

Hi,

I want to ask about my low priority status. In the last game I lost connection for 2,3 minutes because they switch off the power but then I connected the game and continued to play normally, we even won. So why did I still get punished by putting in the low priority queue. It has happened several times until now and my waiting time is 20 minutes. I want to say that is not afk or anything and I even reconnect to continue to play.

Hey there,

Sorry that happened to you and your friend, however could you remove the names from your post as naming & shaming is **not allowed** on the boards.

In the future if something like this happens, please report them in the post-game screen (Include as much detail as possible in your report).
If you miss the opportunity to report them in the post-game screen and you still wish to submit a report, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the info on to the correct team.

hey guys.
In normals you type in as fast as you can what position you want to play.. 
I went ADC n i got it first. so i locked in.
2 other people call their spots (top,jg) got them but then noticed the other 2 people in the lobby just instalocked. 
So we had no communication in lobby and game started. The person who called top then went to mid.
Now we had 2 junglers. so then i got annoyed at how these guys just wanted to do what ever they felt like. 
So i just fed. Straight up fed. i wanted the game to end at 20 so i can get into another game. then after a while they started to talk.. 1 of them said i hope your mum dies and the other starts saying SB over and over again. 
So what happens in situations like this? I will end up getting reported for feeding but those guys ruined game at the start. should i have just gone with flow and 2v1 bot lane most likely still rack up a bunch of deaths anyways? 
Also is normals getting same champ select like ranked soon?

Hey Death Dealer 666, 

It sucks when situations like that happen in Champ Select and it is one of the main reasons why we developed the new champion select for League of Legends. We are working on creating a new champion select experience to blind pick as well, but it will take a bit of time.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon
> 
> It is coming to Ranked soon and the plan is for it to replace Blind Pick sometime in the future.

Just to add to the behaviour displayed in this game.

1) You should never intentionally feed, it creates a terrible experience for your team and also ruins the game for the other team. Here is how I usually handle situations where the game is a clear loss, or other players are at each others throats. I play to the best of my ability, I practice mechanics, farming, vision control etc I turn the game into a purely learning experience and focus solely on myself. Even when a game is going bad in all the wrong ways, at the end of the day I still enjoy playing LoL, I still enjoy playing the champion I have picked, and this mentality helps me a lot to bring out enjoyment and experience even in extremely frustrating experiences.

2) The behaviour displayed by the others in your team is also not okay, I hope you reported them after game.

3) Please try to keep in mind 2 wrongs do not make a right. Just because others are behaving badly doesn't mean you should as well. Don't add fuel to the fire, be a positive force in our community!

Hey,
Need help with a perma ban that actually isnt permeant . 
Please help!
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/h33LTFGx-permanently-suspended-for-suspicious-activity

Sorry!, Posted my forum post about being permabanned for toxicity in the wrong area lol. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/qLP5z6ru-regards-toxicity-in-oce?comment=000000000002

Please check my request
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/w0hjnlEz-suspended-for-malicious-changes
I also have a ticket open to support about it.
This is very unfair. I am left high and dry

If you receive enough verbal abuse reports (the "frustration" report most people go for), EVEN without evidence will the system chat restrict you?
Furthermore, if you have had a chat restriction in the past, will frustration reports more easily restrict you?

Basically what I've found is people will be disappointed in my performance for a game and I end up with the "verbal abuse" warning after a game. I barely talk in games now because some of the people I play with get me frustrated. And I'm playing a game so it should be fun right? This happens a few times and then I end up with a chat restriction. What I've found, is when this happens again after a chat restriction, it only takes one or two people to throw me back into a chat restriction.

To be honest, that's why I play on this account now. My main account is basically in the toxic sin bin from what I can tell. Get matched with WAY more toxic players, which is kind of silly because the system has basically not given me an environment to improve if that is the case.

Hey, just wanted to clear a few things up here.

A) It's not only reports that are taken into account when punishments are handed out, actual language and behaviour is taken into account too. If you don't say anything wrong you won't get punished.

B) We do not have a "sin bin", there is no separate queue to match players with other toxic players. We don't believe in the prisoners island concept.

You can read more about false reports and our systems in place here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback

If you're really interested this video talks a bit about our instant feedback system and how it uses machine learning. I suggest watching all of it if you have time as it provides a lot of insight. But the part I'm talking about starts at around 12 minutes.

http://www.gdcvault.com/play/1022160/More-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player

If you liked those feel free to check out the other GDC talks as well

http://gdcvault.com/play/1017940/The-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player
http://www.gdcvault.com/play/1020389/Enhancing-Sportsmanship-in-Online
can u explain how it's possible for a guy to feed for >2 months and not get banned
